alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 10:45AM MST until January 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with up to 6 inches above 8500 feet. * WHERE...Portions of the White Mountain region above 7000 feet, including Alpine, Greer and McNary. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 10 AM Today to 5 AM Wednesday: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches Show Low 0 inches Whiteriver 0 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
